channel.title: Learning on Learn, Build & Break
channel.description: Recent content in Learning on Learn, Build & Break

item.title: Little experience in bugbounty hunting
item.description: Hello friends, hope you are doing well. Yesterday, I had gone for LinuxChix india meetup. I found some people interested in magic the bugbounty hunters do in finding the security loopholes. So I am sharing some resources as well as my experience. Oh, let me introduce myself, My name is Abhishek Bundela, undergraduate from Shri Mata Vaishno Devi University. I do bugbounty for the feeling of excitement and of course, for the cash.
